name: @niftysave/scanner
description: Job that scans chain for erc-721 tokens

scripts.coverage: c8 npm test && c8 report --reporter lcov --reporter html
scripts.generate-erc721-source: generate-graphql-client --post --endpoint https://api.thegraph.com/subgraphs/name/nftstorage/eip721-subgraph --output ./sources/erc721 && cp template/* sources/erc721 && tsc ./sources/erc721/schema.ts --moduleResolution node --target esnext --esModuleInterop
scripts.generate-db-source: generate-graphql-client --fetcher ./tools/fetcher.cjs --output ./sources/db && cp template/* sources/db && tsc ./sources/db/schema.ts --moduleResolution node --target esnext --esModuleInterop
